Uses of Package
com.oracle.tools.runtime

Packages that use com.oracle.tools.runtime
com.oracle.tools.runtime   
com.oracle.tools.runtime.console   
com.oracle.tools.runtime.java   
 

Classes in com.oracle.tools.runtime used by com.oracle.tools.runtime
AbstractApplication
          An AbstractApplication is a base implementation for an Application that interally uses a Process as a means of representing and controlling the said Application, typically at the operating system level.
AbstractApplicationBuilder
          An AbstractApplicationBuilder is a base implementation of an ApplicationBuilder.
AbstractApplicationSchema
          An AbstractApplicationSchema is a base implementation of an ApplicationSchema.
Application
          An Application provides a mechanism to represent, access and control an executing application process, typically managed by an operating system.
Application.EventKind
          The Application Application.EventKinds.
ApplicationBuilder
          An ApplicationBuilder is responsible the creation of Applications based on ApplicationSchemas.
ApplicationConsole
          An ApplicationConsole provides standard out and err output facilities to an executing application.
ApplicationGroup
          An ApplicationGroup represents a collection of related Applications at runtime.
ApplicationGroupBuilder
          An ApplicationGroupBuilder is a builder for ApplicationGroups.
ApplicationSchema
          ApplicationSchema defines a schema encapsulating configuration and operational settings that an ApplicationBuilder will use to realize an Application.
LifecycleEvent
          A LifecycleEvent captures the information pertaining to an event in the life-cycle of a subject (ie: object).
LifecycleEventInterceptor
          A LifecycleEventInterceptor provides the ability to intercept and process LifecycleEvents that occur during the life-cycle of an object.
PropertiesBuilder
          A PropertiesBuilder defines a set of property definitions that when realized may be used as a traditional Map of name value pair properties.
SimpleApplication
          A SimpleApplication is a simple implementation of an Application.
SimpleApplicationSchema
          A SimpleApplicationSchema is a simple implementation of an ApplicationSchema.
 

Classes in com.oracle.tools.runtime used by com.oracle.tools.runtime.console
ApplicationConsole
          An ApplicationConsole provides standard out and err output facilities to an executing application.
